Articles.Content:
Was getting ready for bed when I saw the first Dr. Dre album in 16 years just dropped. I love hip hop and I love Dre. Anyone else?

Giving it my first listen now.
No not me.. I like Sisters of Mercy, Rammstein...etc.. ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
